Pre-Game Insights: The Portland Trail Blazers host the Golden State Warriors in the season opener.
The Trail Blazers averaged 106.4 points per game last season, 46.8 in the paint, 15.8 off of turnovers and 12.7 on fast breaks.
The Warriors averaged 29.3 assists per game on 43.7 made field goals last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE is Warriors -6; over/under is 223.5.
The Trail Blazers finished 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference action last season.
The Warriors went 46-36 overall and 26-26 in Western Conference action during the 2023-24 season.
Others: Matisse Thybulle: out (knee), Robert Williams III: out (hamstring), Shaedon Sharpe: out (shoulder) for the Trail Blazers.
No listed injuries for the Warriors.
